skills.title: React.js

portfolio.title: E-commerce Website
portfolio.description: Developed a e-commerce website using Django and jQuery, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, featuring a product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout. Managed products, users, and orders with Django's default SQLite database.

portfolio.title: Memory Game
portfolio.description: Created an online memory card-matching game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring smooth card flip animations, score tracking, and an engaging user interface. Optimized for browser performance with a live playable version.

portfolio.title: Weather Site
portfolio.description: Built a weather app using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js, featuring real-time weather data retrieval via an external API, a user-friendly search interface, and deployment on GitHub for public access.
